price: በውስጣቸውም ደግ መኖሩን አላህ ባወቀ ኖሮ (የመረዳትን መስማት) ባሰማቸው ነበር፡፡ (ደግ የሌለባቸው መኾኑን ሲያውቅ) ባሰማቸውም ኖሮ እነሱ እውነትን የተው ኾነው በሸሹ ነበር፡፡
arabic: وَلَوۡ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا لَّأَسۡمَعَهُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ أَسۡمَعَهُمۡ لَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw ʿalima al-lahu fīhim khayran la-asmaʿahum walaw asmaʿahum latawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
translations: surely, He (would) have made them hear
surely they would have turned away
